      • createBitmapFromGLSurface

        static android.graphics.Bitmap createBitmapFromGLSurface(android.opengl.GLSurfaceView glSurfaceView,
                                                         javax.microedition.khronos.opengles.GL10 gl)
                                                  throws java.lang.OutOfMemoryError
        Save filter bitmap from ImageFilterView
        Parameters:
        glSurfaceView - surface view on which is image is drawn
        gl - open gl source to read pixels from GLSurfaceView
        Returns:
        save bitmap
        Throws:
        java.lang.OutOfMemoryError - error when system is out of memory to load and save bitmap
